resources.string: Maciptv is an extension that will allow you to enjoy your IPTV accounts. Give the provider\'s portal url http:\/\/exemple.com\/c\/ and your mac 00:1A:79:XX:XX as password123. To select/revert to the default account, create an account with \'none\' instead of \'127.0.0.1\' and no need to fill in the other info
